sentence.text: Hair-natural killer cell activation involved in immune response ectodermal dysplasia (HNED; OMIM 602032) constitutes a rare subgroup of ectodermal dysplasias characterised by onychodystrophy, hypotrichosis and brittle hair.

entity.text: natural killer cell activation involved in immune response

sentence.text: Our study confirms linkage of a variant clinical form of hair-natural killer cell activation involved in immune response ectodermal dysplasia to chromosome 12 without any mutation in the coding sequences of the epidermis development gene.

entity.text: natural killer cell activation involved in immune response
